code_value: ets_th1 What do you think of my new car?</br>ets_th2 I am so sorry. I just knocked over your coffee.</br>ets_th3 May I speak to Mr. White, the director of the department, please?</br>ets_th4 The beef you cooked is really tender and tasty.
ets_th1 What do you think of my new car?
ets_th2 I am so sorry. I just knocked over your coffee.
ets_th3 May I speak to Mr. White, the director of the department, please?
ets_th4 The beef you cooked is really tender and tasty.
